item.title: Report X-2024101708
item.description:
Report X-2024101708

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-22
  • City: CASS CITY
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE STARTED LEAKING WHILE TRAVELING DOWN THE BELT. LIQUID STARTED LEAKING OUT FROM CAP. PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE BELT WHEN BEING PICKED UP BECAUSE IT WAS LEAKING AND A SPILL TUB WAS USED TO CONTAINERIZE THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024101675
item.description:
Report X-2024101675

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-31T09:22:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-29
  • City: LAKE ORION
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package came down the IC belt already in a black tote with some powder already leaking out. Began to process it as a normal damage with a broken lid until I saw the warning label on it. SDS says that the material is hazardous as a powder form (which this is) and there was no Hazardous Labels on it.
